title: aanai mughattOnE
sahitya:
Anai mukhattOnE aindu karattAl aruLvAi  kOnE anbaruLatt

(Anai)



anupallavi



tEn vaNDu pADiDum tIntamizh shOlaiyil tEDiyun ponnaDiyai

pAdippaNindu ninrEn 

(Anai)



caraNam



kuTram kuraigaLellAm nIkkiDuvAi makkaL guNamenum

kunrErat-tuNaiyiruppAi pirappai

uTruNarvAr tamakkE uyarvaLippAi enrum Om enum uruvattil

niraindiruppAi endai 

(Anai)
